SELECT a.notice_id, a.table_id, a.is_read, a.create_time, a.from_user_id, a.text, b.`name`,
c.title,
b.img from blog_notice a LEFT JOIN blog_user b ON a.from_user_id=b.user_id
left join blog_article c on c.article_id=a.table_id
WHERE a.user_id=#{pm.user_id}
and a.notice_type=#{pm.notice_type}
ORDER BY is_read ASC

SELECT a.notice_id, a.user_id, a.from_user_id, a.table_id, a.create_time, b.`name`, b.img, c.`name` as from_name, c.img as from_img, d.content, d.comment_id, ifnull(d.parent_id,"0") as parent_id, e.title from blog_notice a,blog_user b,blog_user c,blog_comment d,blog_article e WHERE a.notice_type='system' AND a.user_id=b.user_id AND a.from_user_id=c.user_id AND a.text=d.comment_id AND a.table_id=e.article_id

SELECT a.letter_id, a.parent_id, a.user_id, a.from_user_id, a.content, a.create_time, b.`name`, b.img from blog_letter a LEFT JOIN blog_user b ON a.from_user_id=b.user_id WHERE (parent_id=#{table_id} OR letter_id=#{table_id}) AND (a.user_id=#{user_id} OR a.from_user_id=#{user_id})

SELECT count(*) as totalNum, sum(case when a.notice_type='praise' THEN 1 else 0 end) as praiseNum, sum(case when a.notice_type='concern' THEN 1 else 0 end) as concernNum, sum(case when a.notice_type='letter' THEN 1 else 0 end) as letterNum, sum(case when a.notice_type='system' THEN 1 else 0 end) as systemNum, sum(case when a.notice_type='comment' THEN 1 else 0 end) as commentNum FROM blog_notice a where a.is_read=0 and a.user_id=#{user_id}
mapper.update: update blog_notice set is_read=1 where notice_type=#{notice_type}
mapper.insert: insert into blog_letter( parent_id, user_id, from_user_id, content, create_time ) values ( #{parent_id}, #{from_user_id}, #{user_id}, #{content}, #{create_time} )
